data.name: 'n Verlore Verstand Demo
data.detailed_description:
The Demo version of 'n Verlore Verstand includes all of the initial levels to give you a feel of the game. If you like it, be sure to purchase the full version so you can receive new levels and updates.

In 'n Verlore Verstand you will be transported to a reality of dreams and nightmares. What will you discover about yourself in this journey through the subconscious?

In these realms of the unknown, you must travel through labyrinths of memories to eventually find your way to your own truth.

Features:

-Abstract adventure.
-Engaging dream-like environments.
-Mysterious puzzles.
-Platforming
-Exploration
-Oculus Rift integration.

data.supported_languages: English, French, Italian, German, Spanish - Spain, Arabic, Bulgarian, Czech, Danish, Dutch, Finnish, Greek, Hungarian, Japanese, Korean, Norwegian, Polish, Portuguese, Portuguese - Brazil, Romanian, Russian, Simplified Chinese, Swedish, Thai, Traditional Chinese, Turkish, Ukrainian
